inn1.comm: length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side by Tharanga

beauty from Vinay, Tharanga's troubles in Australia continue, a short of length ball that moves away a touch, Tharanga doesn't bother much about his footwork as he fishes at the ball, nicks it and it's easy for Dhoni, who has to move forward a touch to collect that
pitched up and outside off, Sangakkara gets going with an easy-on-the-eye drive through cover, not the best timed of shots though
nice movement away for Vinay, back of a length and swerving away, 135kph, left alone by Dilshan
and again, pitching just outside off and moving away, Dilshan shoulders arms
shortish ball, heading for middle stump, defended from the crease
gets it to swing away first up, pitching on a length and moving away, defended by Sangakkara
not much pace yet from Irfan, 122kph, starting outside off and snaking away, Sanga's feet don't move as he slashes at the ball and misses
this one is 132 kph, tucked towards mid-on and a quick single is pinched
132.8kph this time, jags sharply back in towards Dilshan, blocked from the crease
gets his line wrong this time, slides it down the leg side, once more he gets the ball to seam back
short of length ball swaying away, blocked from the crease towards the off side
back of a length from Vinay, Dilshan covers the line from the crease and defends down the line.
away movement from short of a length, enough to coax Dilshan to steer it away and he times well, but can't beat point.
fuller and straight, Dilshan punches to mid-on.
sliding down the leg side Dilshan tries a big heave and misses.
short ball, mistimes the cut and it goes to point.
full and tailing in late, Dilshan punches without middling it straight to mid-on.
back of a length, Dilshan defends again. Good over, barring the wide, and Dilshan again seems keen to bat long.
Irfan continues to get big swing away, and this one bounces too from back of a length. Sanga tries to cut, but he misses.
fuller this time, and snaking away from middle and leg line. Sanga is drawn forward and defends to the off side.
angles in and curls away from outside off. The pace is up to almost 135 kph - this is Irfan at is best, now how long can he sustain it? Sanga watches closely and leaves.
not very long by the looks of it. Drops this one too short and Sanga sets up early to crash it away square even as it swings away. A hit-me ball, that.
much better. Fuller length at 133 kph, and the ball straightens. Sanga plays consciously with a straight bat.
back of a length and away seam, Sanga leaves. Interesting over that.
poor delivery from Vinay, and Dilshan rolls his wrists to get his first four. Over-pitched on the pads, Dilshan flicks it away with the angle for four.
shortens the length outside off, Dilshan stands tall and defends to the off side.
short of a length, angling into the body. Dilshan misses out as he tries to lash the pull, but can't make contact.
short ball, too wide. Not Vinay's best over this. Dilshan had to reach out to cut and still could not make a clean connection. A thick bottom edge scurries to third man for two.
cuts the angle and the width, Dilshan defends carefully.
whoa, Vinay produces a vicious offcutter that shreds Dilshan to pieces as he shapes to cut. It kept coming in, and barely missed the stumps as Dilshan realised he was playing the wrong shot.
fuller ball on middle and leg, punched towards mid-on by Sangakkara
nice movement away for Irfan there, Sangakkara defends that one off the back foot towards point, that was around 130kph
closer to off this time, no room at all for Sangakkara, who defends it down the track
length ball on the pads, easy two for Sangakkara after he pushes the ball between mid-on and midwicket
short of length ball moving away a hint, 128kph, slapped towards point off the back foot
Sangakkara looks to throw Irfan off his length by walking down the track, clips the length ball towards midwicket, where Jadeja makes a smart stop preventing the single
good line from Vinay, keeping it around off, Dilshan defends, he hasn't been in his usual hit-everything mode today

and just after I said that, Dilshan looks to pummel a short of length ball over midwicket, doesn't connect too well, hits high on the bat, and the ball lands just short of a diving Jadeja at midwicket

the first six of the game, short ball from Vinay, Dilshan looks to smash it over the leg side, he gets a top edge and the ball soars high, India think the man at deep square leg has a chance to catch that, but it is well beyond him
nicely struck by Dilshan, eased through the covers for a couple
on the pads this time, helped behind square leg by Dilshan
length ball on the leg stump, defended to the leg side to end the over

Irfan has a wicket, with his trademark incutter, Dilshan throws his bat at that one outside off, bottom edges it through to the keeper, Dhoni doesn't bother with appealing, just throws the ball up in the air to celebrate the wicket
shortish ball just outside off, Chandimal gets off the mark with a delicate steer behind backward point
good line and length from Irfan, pitching on off and moving away from Sangakkara who defends it
length ball on the pads, defended towards square leg by Sangakkara
length ball shaping away, blocked to the off side by Sangakkara
131 kph to end the over, too wide outside off for Sangakkara to be interested
length ball on off stump, defended by Chandimal
short of length on off stump, defended down the track
on middle and off, Chandimal tucks the ball towards square leg, several calls before the batsmen decide there isn't a run to be had
keeps it tight around off stump, blocked from the crease towards point
Vinay Kumar goes up for a loud lbw appeal, that seemed to be headed down the leg side, Chandimal wanted to work the ball to the leg side but misses and is struck high on the pad
that's a maiden from Vinay, a length ball just outside off, defended off the front foot to the leg side, bottom hand comes off the bat as Chandimal keeps that ball out
124.2kph, length ball snaking away from off, solidly defended off the front foot by Sangakkara
trying for too much there Irfan, a fuller ball pitching on leg stump, eased past midwicket by Sangakkara
127kph this time, better line, short of length ball swerving outside off, chopped towards point
length ball on off stump, Sangakkara shuffles across and clips the ball towards square leg for an easy single
pitched up and outside off, Chandimal was going for the off drive, a bit of an inside-edge as the ball dribbles to the leg side, this was 131kph
short of length ball on middle stump, defended back towards the bowler, India's new ball bowlers doing a decent job here
just wide of off stump, Sangakkara drops the ball to the off side and zips through for a single
length ball outside off, driven off the front foot towards cover, can't beat the fielder
a classy whip from Chandimal, it was pitched up and on middle stump, a wristy flick sends the ball towards deep square leg
looks to power this one through cover, a diving stop by Raina makes sure it is a dot ball
moves across and thumps this towards deep square leg for a single
lovely drive from Sangakkara, pitched up by Vinay and Sanga eases it past mid-off, who chases after the ball in vain
Chandimal is cramped up by the inward movement as he looks to thrash the ball through the off, the ball rolls towards cover
that would have been a wide down the leg side, but it strikes Chandimal's pad as he looks to moves across the stumps
helped along towards deep square leg, Sri Lanka want a quick second, Kohli fires in the throw, Sangakkara has to dive to make his ground, that needed a direct hit
muscles this one away, the shortish ball jagged back in towards Chandimal, who came down the track and flayed it through cover for four
starts with a full toss on middle stump, Chandimal moves across and tucks the ball towards deep square leg for a couple
short ball, 145 kph, Chandimal wants to pull that powerfully, mistimes it towards midwicket
147.4kph now, length ball outside off, worked towards third man
length ball on middle and leg, defended towards midwicket
strays down the leg side, Sangakkara looks to shuffle across and wants to help it down to fine leg, off the pad
full and on leg stump, glanced down to fine led, the man at deep backward square leg has a long chase ahead, he can't make it in time, that's a good over for Sri Lanka
defended from the crease by Sangakkara
length ball on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on by Sangakkara
short of length ball shaping away, defended towards point by Sangakkara
short of length ball outside off is slapped towards sweeper cover by Sangakkara
130.9kph, short of length ball outside off, Chandimall pushes it towards cover off the front foot, wants one but is sent back early
134.1kph, length ball heading for leg stump, helped towards deep backward square leg, batsmen sprint two
full and wide from Umesh, Sangakkara bends his knee as he reaches out to that and sends the ball towards sweeper cover
short of length ball outside off, glides it down towards third man for a single
short of length ball outside off, played with soft hands behind point for a single
shortish ball, worked towards midwicket for a singe
speed gun says that was 106.9kph, shortish ball outside off, Sangakkara drops his bat and lets that go
helped along towards square leg for one more
length ball on off stump, defended to the off side
length ball on middle and leg, pushed it back towards the bowler, a little uppishly
length ball outside off, pushed towards cover
length ball heading for off, drops it towards point, Chandimal wants one, Sanga doesn't, wisely too as there is a direct hit from Kohli at the non-striker's end
gracefully works it towards extra cover
stifled lbw appeal, that looked to have pitched outside leg stump so the umpire isn't interested
lovely stroke from Sanga, a 141kph pitched up delivery just outside off, Sanga gracefully punches it down the ground, Chandimal has to jump to let the ball through his legs
length ball outside off, poked towards third man
short of length ball on leg stump, blocked towards midwicket
just outside off, Sangakkara opens the face to guide the ball towards short third man
147kph, pretty short on leg stump, Chandimal looks to pull, that was too quick for him, off the glove down to fine leg for four
length ball outside off, punched towards extra cover, where substitute fielder Praveen Kumar makes a tumbling stop
tossed up, length ball pitching outside leg stump, defended to the leg side
keeps it around leg stump, worked towards square leg
shorter ball this time, on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
spins away from the left-hander, defended down the track
length ball outside off, pushed towards cover off the front foot
short of length ball on leg stump, blocked to the leg side
starts with a pitched up ball on middle and off, defended down the track
a touch shorter, on off stump, defended once more
length ball just outside off, punched towards mid-off by Sangakkara
short of length ball, Sangakkara charges down the track and whips the ball towards deep midwicket, Kohli has plenty of ground to stop that, does well to cut it off
length ball on off stump, punched towards mid-off
not the most pretty of strokes, Chandimal looks to thrash the ball to midwicket, doesn't quite get hold of it, and the ball rolls towards midwicket
defends close to the pad and there's an appeal
turn and bounce! That really shot up and beat Sanga
gets a few paces down and pushes it down to mid-on
leading edge! Sangakkara gives Ashwin the charge, tries to launch him over mid-on but spoons a big leading edge down to point, credit to Ashwin for tossing it up
pitches outside leg and clips his pads as he tries to work it away to the on side
goes back at the crease and slaps it straight to cover point
142.9 kph, full and wide and crashed off the front foot but he can't beat extra cover
gets beside the line and opens the face of the bat and dabs it down  towards deep point
hits him high on the pad and there could have been an inside edge, Yadav appeals
145 kph, this time Yadav strays on  the pads and the batsman clips it down to fine leg, the fielder was too square to cut it off
145 kph, gets beside the line and forward and drives it down towards mid-off
gets a bit of width to cut but he ends up chopping it down to cover point
gently tossed up and pushes it down towards long-off
pushes it right back to the bowler, Jadeja's tossing it slowly
tries to hoick it over the on side but ends up mistiming it to square leg
gets well forward and defends to the off side
not the most attractive of shots but he gets enough elevation and distance, chips down the track and fetches it from outside off and hoicks it over midwicket
gets forward and pushes it down to long-on
146 kph, pitches it up and swings it late, mistimes the drive to  the off side
good pace again and he ends up chopping it down to cover point
the slower ball, he gets across and clips it to the on side
clips him high on the pads and Mahela was deceived by the extra pace, that was missing the stumps
fullish in length and he gets an inside edge onto the pads
short and a touch wide and he reaches out and slaps it towards deep point
comes well forward and steers it down towards short third man
gets forward and pushes it down  towards long-on
comes well forward and pushes it down to mid-off
gets right across his stumps and paddles it down to short fine leg
gets forward and drives down the track
gets forward and pushes it down towards long-on
146 kph, full and outside the off stump, he mistimes the cover drive and can't get it past the infield
hurries him on the back foot and he defends
slightly slower and wide of the off stump, Jayawardene reaches out and slaps it wide of backward point and Ashwin sprints at deep point and can;t stop it
145, drops it with soft hands on the pitch and he sets off for a quick single, good running
drifts on the pads and he clips it with the angle down to deep square leg
goes back at the crease and chops it down to deep extra cover
gets forward, opens the face of the bat and steers it to the off side
he targets his favourite on side, gets on his knee and fetches it from the off side and slogs him over square leg
slashes and the outside edge flies past the vacant slips region and it's yet another fifty for this impressive young batsman, bodes really well for Sri Lanka
goes back and he chops it down to deep point
gets forward and defends down the track
beats him on the drive straightaway, a touch wide outside off
goes back and steers him down to cover point
goes across his stumps and he slides it wide down the leg side
gets across and he clips it down to fine leg
gets across and clips him straight to midwicket
moves across his stumps again and clips it with the turn to the leg side
goes back and punches it down the track
good running, just drops it in front of gully and sets off
lunges forward and defends
goes back at the crease, gives room and cuts to point
lovely shot! Tossed up outside off and he gets across and elegantly chips it  over extra cover
drives on the up down towards long-off
gets well forward and defends with soft hands
goes back at the crease and cuts him down to point
gets across and works it down to long-on
tossed up outside the off stump and he reaches forward and pushes it towards deep cover
slides it down the leg side
drops it towards short cover and thinks of a single but sends Jayawardene back
goes back at the crease and chops it down to point
comes round the wicket, the batsman chips down and works it to the on side
turns and bounces and lobs off his pads
drops it short and he swivels and pulls him down to long leg
gets well across his stumps and works it down to long-on
the carrom ball, Chandimal just manages to pick that and defends
stays back at the crease and clips him wide of fine leg
grips and turn and he defends with soft hands
gets across and taps it down to cover point
drops it with soft hands to the on side
stays back and pats it down to cover point
gets across and clips him down to square leg
makes room and steers it softly to the off side
gets forward and pushes it down to long-off
stays back and clips him down to the leg side
goes back and clips him to the on side
hits him on the  base of the pads from round the wicket, Ashwin appeals
goes back and pushes it to the off side
softly tucks it to the on side
turns back in  this time and he makes room and cuts to the off side
gets across and taps it to the off side
nudges it to the on side
skids through, he goes back and chops it down the track
gets right across and paddles it to fine leg
flatter delivery on the pads and he clips it to the on side
plonks forward and defends down the track
tossed up on the pads and he clips it down to long-on
gets across and clips it to the on side
goes back and clips it with the turn to the vacant square leg area
tossed up down the leg side and he sweeps to fine leg
chips down the track and tucks it to midwicket
gives him the charge and picks it from middle and slogs against the turn and clears the deep midwicket fence
works it against the turn to the on side
stays back and tucks it softly to the on side
goes back and punches it to the on side
tossed up down the leg side and clipped to short fine leg
turns it away off his pads
drops it short and he swivels and pulls to long leg
stays back at the crease and slaps it down to deep cover

the bowling change works! Vinay is rewarded for bowling it straight, the ball doesn't bounce as much as Jayawardene expected, hits him fairly low on the pad in front of the stumps as he tries to tuck it away
goes back at the crease and defends with soft hands
defends it solidly back to the bowler
gets off the mark by steering it down towards third man
goes back at the crease and taps it to the off side

Dhoni fluffs a run-out chance! The ball was pulled to fine leg, Yadav threw it to the keeper's end and Chandimal was struggling, Dhoni stretched out his right hand and I wasn't sure whether he was leaving it for the direct hit or trying to  deflect it onto the stumps

Dhoni makes no error this time! What a pity for Chandimal, Mathews dropped it in front of short cover and they have to hurry, the under-arm flick by Rohit is sharp and Dhoni collects and breaks the stumps, the third umpire takes a look
risks dabbing it wide of slip and Yadav fumbles at point
pushes a flatter delivery wide of mid-on
tucks it softly to the on side
fullish in length and he thuds it back to the bowler off the front foot
140 kph, fires it on the pads and he clips it down to deep square leg
149.7 kph, gets nicely beside the line and taps it down to point
gets beside the line and angles it down to third man
fires it outside the off stump and he squeezes it down to third man
145 kph, short and wide and he tries to cut but misses
turns and he taps it towards point
goes back at the crease and defends
good stuff, Perera can only push it back to the bowler
the frustration gets to Perera! He tries to slam it over the infield by staying at the crease, he plays all over it and skies it down to Virat who takes it at deepish mid-off
softly tucks it to the leg side
taps it to the off side and there's an overthrow as well
pushes it back to the bowler
bounce and straightens and squares up the batsman
turns it with soft hands to the on side
flatter delivery and he turns it down to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, he clips it to the on side
pushes it back to the bowler
clips it down to the on side
tossed up on the pads and worked to square leg
goes back at the crease and slaps it down to deep point
gets forward and pushes it down to mid-off
keeps him quiet again, pushes it down to mid-off
turns and bounces and nearly slices Kula in half! Good bowling
goes back and chops it down the pitch
straightens and hits his back leg, stifled appeal
goes back and chops it to the off side
chips down the track but can't beat midwicket
tossed up quicker and he can only defend
tossed up on the pads and he works it down to midwicket
slightly slower outside off and he drives just wide of mid-off and the fielder does well to slide and cut it off
143 kph, short and wide outside the off stump and he slashes and misses
goes right across his stumps and plays a short-arm pull down to long leg
goes right across his stumps and clips it down to midwicket
goes back at the crease and clips him down to midwicket
Mathews gets forward and is happy to block
bowls it short and he pulls to short midwicket
goes back and pulls it past short midwicket
makes room and gets forward and pushes it wide of mid-off
he clips him down to backward square leg
defends close to the pads, another quiet over
fullish in length outside off and he gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
145 kph, Kula makes room and he tries to pull but miscues it, the ball drops in front of long-on
drives firmly and Yadav gets a hand to it and deflects it away
Mathews makes room  and chips down the track to a 141 kph delivery and nicely lofts it over extra cover
bangs it in short and he goes back and clubs it straight to midwicket
short of a length and he goes back and pulls down to long-on
drops it with soft hands towards short point and Tiwary has a shy at the stumps at the batsman's end, good running
sprays it full and wide outside the off stump
Kulasekara makes room and tries to slam it over the off side but ends up getting an outside edge to third man

what a waste for Sri Lanka! Mathews made room and swung at a low full toss swinging away from him, he stepped out of his crease to steal a bye but before he could turn around and make his way back Dhoni had under-armed it to the stumps
half-heartedly tries to dab it down to third man and he misses
steers it to the off side but can't beat the infield
thrashes it off the front foot past cover but sweeper cover's there to cut it off
127 kph, bangs it in short and Senanayake pulls over midwicket but the sweeper cuts it off
pulls to deep midwicket
Dropped, Low full toss and he makes room and places it to the right of Gambhir at extra cover, he gets a hand to it
he makes  room and scoops a pitched-up delivery down to sweeper cover and it's an ordinary effort by Ashwin
clubs it down to deep square leg, the throw is wide and that allows a third
good late surge, he thuds a low full toss down to the sweeper cover region and Tendulkar runs across and tries to boot it away but misses
Pathan bowls round the wicket and bowls it full, Senanayake lofts down to wide long -off
that's very well played, a hint of room and he times the cut very well down to deep point and Tendulkar dives in despair, he nearly pulled it back
goes across and tries to paddle it away but it's a yorker on the pads, the ball rolls to the on side, well bowled
slams a low full toss down to extra cover and Raina throws to the bowler's end but Pathan fails to gather the throw
full and wide outside off and Senanayake fails to dig it out
slower ball and Kulasekara moves across his stumps early to scopp it over short fine leg but he was deceived by the slower one, made the batsman look very foolish there
another slower ball and he can only thud it back down the pitch
the frustration gets to Kulasekara as he tries to hit out, another slower ball, shorter in length, he top edges the pull down to Kohli at point
scoops it over the bowler's head and Raina does well at the straight boundary to slide and cut it off

slams a full delivery down to midwicket, Senanayake ran the first one hard but Malinga wanted the second to give his partner the strike, Senanayake didn't want the second and Malinga had to turn back, he was well short of his ground once Dhoni broke the stumps, the third umpire takes a look
makes room and lofts it down to mid-on

inn2.comm: close call for Gambhir as he gets an inside edge on the drive, the ball lobs towards the keeper
gets across the stumps and pushes it to the off side
fires it down the leg side and it's full, Gambhir tries to flick it away and Sangakkara gets a glove to it
the ball stops on him a bit as he tries to flick it away
gets beside the line and defends solidly on the backfoot
short of a length and straight and Tendulka punches it firmly back to Malinga
short of a length and wide of the off stump and he punches it down to mid-off
drifts on the pads and it's too full and straight, Gambhir easily clips it down to fine leg
a touch too wide outside the off stump and Tendulkar is happy to leave it alone
strays too wide of the leg stump and it moves further away
he stays back and defends this one to the on side
full outside off and he drives but can't beat mid-off
punches it softly towards mid-on and sets off for a quick single
drifts on the pads and clips it down to fine leg
goes back at the crease and drops it with soft hands down to the off side
slices a slightly wide delivery wide of backward point who leaps to his right, third man is square
gets across and pushes it softly down to mid-off
neatly flicked away by Tendulkar, full delivery on his pads and there's protection in the deep for that shot
fullish in length outside the off stump and he drives but can't beat mid-off
Malinga drifts on the pads and Tharanga nearly saved a boundary there, nice dive at the fine leg rope but he was touching the rope as he pulled it back
drifts on the pads and he clips it straight to short midwicket
poor ball by Kulasekara, he drifts down the leg side when there's hardly any protection there, easily flicked to fine leg
drifts it inwards from outside off, safely defended
gets it to drift in and Tendulkar tucks it in front of mid-on but was in trouble, fortunately for him Chandimal's throw was wide
lands it outside off and he safely leaves it alone
Mathews too is guilty of drifting on the pads and easily whipped away behind square
full on the off stump and pushed down to mid-off
gives him width and he reaches out and slices it wide of the vacant point region, the sweeper picks up
in the length to drive straight but he drives inside out down the track
drifts on the pads and he works it down to deep square leg
gets across and pushes it just wide of mid-off
better delivery, gets it around the off stump and solidly defended
tries to cut a ball that keeps a touch low and gets an outside edge that bounces before Sangakkara
gets forward and defends to the off side
angles it inwards around the off stump and Tendulkar shows the full face and drives to mid-off
Kulasekara gets him! The ball angles it from around the off stump, Kulasekara held the length back slightly and Tendulkar was caught on the drive, big outside edge down to Sangakkara
gets across and blocks it to the off side
nice drive off the front foot and well stopped at short cover
another neat drive off the front foot but well stopped again on the off side
comes round the wicket, gives him a hint of width and he cuts him down to deep point
gets across and clips it softly to the on side
shuffles and clips it down to fine leg
Kohli pings the straight boundary. Over-pitched outside off stump by Kula, Kohli leans out to the pitch and shows it the maker's name. Doesn't over-hit it and the ball sings along to the skirtings.
wider of off stump, Kohli pushes into the cover area.
back of a length on off stump, Kohli defends compactly into the off side.
angled into the pads, tucked towards square leg for a single.
good timing from Gauti, skips back in the crease and nudges a ball on the pads towards midwicket for a couple.
Kohli gets the front foot well across and plays around it, but manages to work with the inward angle to midwicket for a single.
vintage Gambhir, stays beside the line and guides the length ball cheekily behind square for a couple.
back of a length outside off stump, Gambhir lets it go.
take that. Slower ball from Angelo, Gambhir seemed to spot it right out of his fingers. He pranced out of the crease, opening up the off side as he did, and crashes it through the covers.
angled in from wide of off stump, Gambhir tucks it with the angle towards square leg.
plugs away on a length at 125 kph, Gambhir defends to the off side.
back of a length outside off, Gambhir defends from the crease to the off side.
Kula pitches one one outside off and Kohli drives with the full face into the covers.
back of a length legcutter, Kohli punches into the covers.
over-pitched on off stump, another ominous looking drive from Kohli that finds mid-off. Shades of Dravid in the mid-to-late 90s.
hmm, nervy poke outside off. Kula drops the length and gets the ball to dance away slightly. Kohli opens the face and pushes tentatively, but escapes without an edge.
straight ball on a length, defended down the track.
top timing on a quiet little nudge through the leg side as Kula strays onto the pads. Kohli scampers back for the second.
length ball to start off proceedings, Gambhir hops and whips off the pads through square leg for a single.
well timed, and well fielded. Virat stands tall and punches into the covers, but Chandimal's prowling there cat-like. He dives away and parries it, but the single is taken.
Gambhir stays on the leg stump line and deflects a length ball to the off side.

Gambhir escapes a run out. Total madcap running, he pushes a length ball straight to Mahela at mid-off, who picked up and shied in a trice. The ball went excruciatingly close to the stumps, with Gauti well out.
short of a length outside off, Kohli tries to lash into the covers but can't thread the field.
tight line on middle and leg, Gambhir stays in the crease and defends to the leg side.
angled across outside off, Gambhir defends from the crease, away from the body, but keeps it out.
on the pads again, Gambhir nurdles it square for a single.
ahem, Kohli is ages late on a pull from outside off, and toe-ends it to cover-point. Did that stop on him? Clocked only 130 kph.
legcutter pitched up wide of off stump, Kohli square drives to point, where Dilshan dives and half-stops it. Single taken.
whips across him at 125 kph, Gambhir steers to backward point.
length ball outside off, Kohli drives laboriously to mid-on.
Kohli isn't getting much to drive, but seems to have a lot of time to play his shots. Another calm push into the extra cover area gets him a single.
Gambhir tucks with the angle behind square for another single.
length ball to Kohli, again pushed wide of mid-off for a single.
ooh, timing! On Gambhir's pads at 142 kph, and he nonchalantly whips it behind square with a magical turn of the wrists, the ball fairly whistles away to the boundary.
angled in from round the stumps, Gambhir defends from the crease.
tossed up on the off stump and he drives down to mid-off
Gambhir sizes up to cut but decides to leave it alone to the keeper
goes back and punches it to long-on
gets well forward and pushes wide of cover
tossed up on the pads and he clips it down towards midwicket
drops it to the off side and takes a quick single
Kohli's trapped playing across the line, the ball lands on the off stump and nips back in slightly, Kohli tries to whip it away but the ball hits him a bit low on the pads, quite straightforward
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
sprays it too wide outside the off stump, too wide to even chase that
nicely driven off the front foot, half volley on the off stump and he merely pushes it through the line wide of mid-off and cover
steers it softly to the off side
sprays it wide outside the off stump again
gets beside the line and he steers it down to point and there's an overthrow
clips it down to square leg
well played, he drops it short and a touch wide, no turn, he goes back at the crease and slaps it down to deep extra cover
clips it down towards midwicket
tossed up and he gets forward and defends
flatter delivery, he gets forward and defends
gets forward and drives to the covers
effortlessly driven by Gambhir, the keeper was up to the stumps, he merely went forward and crisply drove it wide of extra cover
gets forward and defends to the off side
tucks him up for room and he defends
a bit too straight and he clips it off his pads down to deep square leg
angles towards the body and he clips it down to midwicket
tossed up on the pads and he clips it to the on side
gets well forward and defends to the off side
this one spins in and skids through and he manages to chop it away
gets forward and drives back to the bowler
Rohit solid in forward defense again
quicker one and skids through and he goes back and defends
drifts on the pads and he works him down to fine leg
comes round the wicket, tossed up on the pads and defended to the on side
quietly defended on the front foot again
stays on the back foot and defends again
tossed up on middle and leg and he clips it to square leg
stays back and clips it to the on side, not much turn for Senanayake yet
big appeal from bowler and keeper! Hits him on the base of the pad but there may have been an inside edge
drives back to the bowler
skids through, he goes back and cuts to third man
stays back and clips him down to deep midwicket
comes forward and defends
defends to the off side
tossed up on the pads and he gently works it down to fine leg
comes well forward and defends
tossed up on the off stump and he lunges forward and drives high and clear of the infield, boundary to deep extra cover
gets forward and clips him down to midwicket
clips it softly down to deep square leg
waits for the turn, stays back and clips it to down to cover point
clips it to mid-on and takes a quick single
reaches out and cuts it to point

the direct hit sends him back, he steers it to backward point and calls for the quick single, Jayawardene hits the target at the striker's end and the third umpire takes a look, excellent pick up and throw by the captain
beats him on the forward prod and the keeper whips off the bails
makes room and chops it down to the off side
gets well forward and defends
defends this one in front of off and middle
loops it towards the pads and he squeezes it to square leg
stays back and blocks it to the off side
Gambhir chips down the track and lofts him inside out over cover, there are two fielders patrolling the area
he woks it down to long-on
on the pads and he clips it down to midwicket
gets on his knee and sweeps him down to fine leg
drives him down to long-on
chips down the track and chips it down to long-on
goes back and chops it down to the off side
Gambhir tucks it behind square on the on side and brings up his fifty!
gets well forward and smothers the spin
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
spoons it off the front foot but wide of short cover
gets well forward and drives towards cover
fullish on the off stump and he clips it towards midwicket
fullish in length outside the off stump and he dabs it to the off side
a bit too straight and he shuffles and tucks him down to square leg
fullish on the stumps and he gets across and squeezes it out back to the bowler
swings it in on the pads and he clips it away wide of square leg
full and wide outside the off stump, Gambhir gets across and drives it neatly down to sweeper cover
gets forward and drives it down to extra cover
tucks it softly towards the vacant midwicket region for a single
gets well across his stumps and paddles it down to fine leg
goes back at the crease and cuts him down to backward point
comes well forward and drives him down towards long-off
stays back at the crease and chops it down the pitch
shuffles across and clips it down to midwicket
he shuffles and clips it down towards fine leg
the bouncer and he stays back and pulls down to fine leg

very well taken by Sangakkara! Malinga fired it down the leg side and Raina tried to run it down to fine leg, he clipped it off the face of the bat and Sangakkara anticipated well and moved quickly to his right
gets across and pushes it down the track back to the bowler
sloppy fielding! Dhoni pushed at a full delivery and timed it well but the fielder at cover totally fluffed it on the dive
superb stop by Dilshan at short point, he intercepted a fierce cut
almost an action replay! Gambhir slashed at it hard and Dilshan was alert at short point, Sri Lankans have a spring in their step
a touch too wide and he steers it down to third man
nips back in and Dhoni stays right back the crease and whips it across the line
opens the face of the bat and gently dabs it down to third man
clips it uppishly off his pads and runs it down to deep square leg
opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
nicely controlled! Short delivery rising on the shoulder and Gambhir moved across and controlled the pull well down to fine leg on one leg
straight on the pads and he clips it away down to square leg
low full toss on the pads and he clips it down towards deep square leg
short and wide and he slashes it down to square third man, the fielder does really well to sprint across and fire in the throw, limits it to just a single
Dropped Dhoni spoons it hard back to the bowler's ;left and Perera stretches out his hand and fails to hang on
tries to steer it behind the wicket but can't get it past short third man
gets a bit of width and he opens the face of the bat and angles it down to deep point
words can't describe Dhoni's technique here! Stood at the crease and poked his bat forward and squirted out a full delivery, nearly lost balance after playing the shot
he watchfully leaves it alone to the keeper
thumps it straight to short cover, rooted to the crease, typical Dhoni
dropped it in front of mid-off and Dhoni was lightning quick between the wickets
cuts and nearly goes on the full to short third man
he risks sweeping the flatter delivery and is hit on the pads but perhaps down the leg side, the umpire isn't convinced
clips it down to square leg
cuts it down to sweeper cover and takes a single
slashes it down to sweeper cover
stabs it down to cover
good length delivery on middle and leg and he works it down to mid-on
clips it down towards mid-on for a single
angles it on the pads and he shuffles and clips him away down towards square leg, it was in the air but safe
nicely played, he gets on his knee and paddles it down to fine leg, Dhoni's on wheels here, he hurries Gambhir for three
goes back and punches it towards cover
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
gets well forward and pushes it down the track
gets a big inside edge onto the pads and the bowler  appeals
lunges forward and squirts a low full toss down to long-off
stays back and clips it down towards square leg
stays back and clips it down towards fine leg for a couple
gets well forward to drive and he gets an outside edge down to third man
goes back and dabs it to the off side
opens the face of the bat, makes a bit of room and slices it down to third man, short third man gives chase
gets on the front foot and defends
chips down the track and squirts out a full delivery to the on side
gets forward and chips a low full toss down to midwicket
goes on the back foot and cuts it down to cover
fires it wide down the leg side
tosses it up and he clips it down to midwicket
goes back at the crease and chops it down to short third man
clips it to the on side and sets off for a risky single, Gambhir just about beats the throw
stays back at the crease and thumps it down to cover
that sped off the bat! Overpitched outside the off stump and bashes it wide of the bowler, Kula doesn't even attempt to catch that, the ball races past mid-off
gets across and punches it down to cover
gets across and pushes it firmly down the track
gets across and clips it down to mid-on
tossed up on the pads and clipped down to deep square leg
stays back and clips it down to midwicket for a quick single
shot! Tossed up outside the off stump and he leans forward and drives crisply past the covers
pitches outside off and straightens and hits his pads and there's a big appeal but that wasn't hitting
gets forward and clips it to the on side
gets forward and blocks it out to the on side
fires it flat outside off and he squeezes it out to cover point
spoons it on the up wide of mid-off and Kulasekara does really well to slide to his right and cut it off and in one motion throw it back but there was nobody backing up
fullish in length outside off and he squeezes it out to point
fires it on the pads and he squeezes it out towards mid-on
spoons it in the air inside out past the bowler, safe of the fielders though, mid-off runs across and cuts it off
gets across and pushes it down to mid-off
driven hard back to the bowler who boots it away, not always recommended but no damage done
walks across and works it down towards long-on
comes round the wicket and Gambhir gets across and clips it in the air down to deep midwicket, might be worth getting a fielder there within the ring
gets forward and drives it back to the bowler
pounded down the ground and once again Kula tries to get his boot in the way
drives a full delivery down to long-on
goes back at the crease and punches it down to cover
keeps it on the stumps and he turns the face of the bat and knocks it to the on side

Appeal for a run-out! He's gone! Against the run of play, Dhoni pushes it towards mid-on and appears to set off for a run, Gambhir is also off the blocks but there was never a single, he turns around and can't make it before the direct hit by Kulasekara
full on middle and leg and he clips it to mid-on
gets across and knocks it back to the bowler
gets across and taps it down to mid-off
comes round the wicket and he stays back and knocks it to the off side
steers it towards cover point and he can't sneak a single
tucks him up for room and he can only place it straight to short cover
gets across and clips it in the air down to midwicket
goes across the stumps and clips him down to mid-on for a single
stays back and thumps it wide of mid-off and sets off for a quick single to retain the strike
drops just short of Kulasekara! Dhoni just managed to control the shot
full on middle and leg and he tucks it to the on side
gets on the front foot and it lobs away down to midwicket
slashed away hard on the front foot and it rockets straight to Senanayake at point
squirts out a yorker outside off and he can't beat point again, pressure mounting
full on the pads and he works it to the on side but can only pick up a single
Jadeja punches a length delivery down towards long-off
another solid punch down to long-off, he jogs the single

the captain sets a fine example again! Perera pitches it up outside the off stump, he shapes to drive through the covers but ends up driving uppishly and Jayawardene dives to his right and takes it inches off the ground
stylishly whipped away off the pads down to deep square leg to get off the mark
brilliant fielding again! Senanayake intercepts a booming drive off the front foot at short cover
flicks it straight to midwicket
Malinga was very lucky to get away with a low full toss on the pads, he works it to deep square leg, he should have played that finer
drifts on the pads and Ashwin whips it behind square on the on side
low full toss and he pushes it down to long-on, Dhoni's preserving himself for a late assault
drives a full delivery wide of sweeper cover and that allows a second run
keeps it on the stumps and ashwin can only flick it straight to midwicket
fullish in length on the off stump and he makes room and squeezes it out to the off side
full and swinging away from him and he drives with one arm and misses it completely
that big six has arrived! Full outside the off stump and Dhoni stays at the crease and has a free swing over wide long-on, not as big as the previous six against Australia
drives firmly down to extra cover
Ashwin joins the fun, he makes room and crisply lofts it over extra cover, the field was up, clean hit
slower ball on the pads and he clips it down to short fine leg, Herath fields
stabs a low full toss off the toe of the bat, deflects off the bowler
fullish in length and he drives it down to long-off
slower ball and Ashwin reads it well and gets on the back foot and clips it to midwicket
half volley and he fails to put that away and ends up driving straight to short cover
driven to sweeper cover and they could have run two had they pushed harder, wisely they stick to a single
slower ball outside the off stump and he cuts wide of point, this time they have time to pick up two
slower ball outside off, gets across his stumps and Ashwin tries to swing that out of the ground, swishes at thin air
good fielding by Ashwin, he gets in the way of a firm straight drive, deflects to the on side
Sangakkara drops a sitter! Would you believe it! Ashwin top edged it towards point and Sangakkara volunteered to run across and take the catch, point was ready and willing but he spilled it
slower ball and he swings and misses, well well

well that drop didn't cost anything! Yet another slower ball and Ashwin makes room to play the spooned extra cover drive, ends up chipping it straight to extra cover, clever change of pace again does the trick
on the blockhole and on the pads but it's hitting him wide of the leg stump, he tries to work it away and the ball rolls to the off side
fullish in length outside off and he squirts it to cover
bonus for India, that was a full toss very wide of the off stump and pathan couldn't make contact on the slash, close call but the umpire penalises him
full outside off and he mistimes the slash down to extra cover, just drops short of the fielder
comes round the wicket and he sprays it full outside off and Dhoni has a wild swish and misses, he could have swatted ten flies in one shot with that hit
full and wide outside off and he bashes it along the ground straight to sweeper cover
the full toss! Eerily similar to the previous game, he clubs that over deep square leg and it's a no-ball as well!

we have another twist here! Pathan swings and the ball drops on the pitch, he was uncertain whether to run or not but Dhoni was already at the other end, Irfan had to sacrifice his wicket and Angelo had enough time to take aim and hit
take that! Dhoni plays a booming cross-court whack over midwicket, that just whistled to the boundary and that's his fifty!
he reaches out to a full delivery and squeezes it out to the off side and retains the strike
Excellent running! Dhoni jams out a yorker down to long-on and really pushes Vinay, Vinay dives and makes his ground
fires it full and quick and Dhoni has a swipe and gets an inside edge onto the pad and the ball lobs to the off side, now Vinay has the strike
Vinay calmly taps it towards point and sets off, Dhoni is quickly off the blocks
Sri Lanka blow a chance to get Dhoni run-out! He swings it straight to midwicket and the throw is flat and quick to Malinga, he fumbles!
we have a run-out now! Vinay makes room and squirts it out to mid-off and sets off, Mathews under-arms it straight at the stumps and there's no need for the 3rd umpire

a tie! Malinga fires it full and wide and Dhoni reaches out and practically on one leg scoops it over extra cover, Senanayake at sweeper cover cuts it off and parries it to Kulasekara who fires the throw, that gives India enough time to take three, the players check to see if the batsmen ran one run short, but in the end it was all good
